comprehensive_overview: SRA-tools is a set of software tools developed by the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) to assist with the download and analysis of high-throughput sequencing data from the Sequence Read Archive (SRA).
core_features: Download and extract sequencing data from the SRA database
Convert SRA data to a more usable format such as FASTQ
Perform quality control and filtering of sequencing data
Align and map sequencing reads to a reference genome
Analyze and visualize sequencing data for various bioinformatics applications
